scripts.deploy: gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/grinder-cloud/essentia --timeout=9000 && gcloud run deploy essentia --image gcr.io/grinder-cloud/essentia --region=us-east1 --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated --min-instances=0 --max-instances=2 && gcloud run services update-traffic essentia --region=us-east1 --to-revisions LATEST=100
